column4: ok, I was thinking it may have been the WEP that was actually causing part of the problem and maybe I should disable WEP. What do you think ?
that would isolate the error. Works, wep. Not works, network ;)
I'm not a wireless networking expert by any means. But that's what I did to set mine up. Worked with an unsecure network to make sure I had the basics right, then moved on to passwords
